TIP:Upon starting a level, you can go back to worldmap if you enter inside the brown keep, a white door or just by walking left.
TIP:Walking bobombs will tease you and eventually fuck your pussy. BUT the running ones who can blow might fuck you earlier, be warned!
TIP:If you are using a key in your bumhole, creatures will spare it (no anal sex). So, be relieved!
TIP:If the game is lagging, you can press the \'=\' to change the quality and the \'-\' to change zoom.
TIP:Google Chrome or \'Flash Projector\' (standalone app from adobe) may boost game performance.
TIP:Certain levels only appear in certain days, like the Shyguy Village in world 3.
TIP:Is the game slow? Blame Flash and its way to render vectors, not your machine. You can try to activate Stationary camera in the options.
TIP:Bugs may appear. If the princess locks up, try SPACE/SHIFT many times. If not, press DEL (she will lose a life). You can also load a saved game.
TIP:If you\'re using \'Dont make scenes require SKIP presses\', there are creatures you have to fill the bar up, so disable it in those places!
TIP:You can grab Koopa and buzzy beetle shells. Just pass over a NON-MOVING shell while pressing RUN key.
TIP:You can survive physical harm as long as your horny bar is up.
TIP:Press keys 0 to 9 while touching a laid enemy to choose a scene. Then press \'DO-OVER\' key. Not all enemies have this feature.
TIP:Press ENTER for PANIC mode! CTRL returns to the game. Then press / in the keypad to re-enable sounds.
TIP:You can use the inventory only in the worldmap. Press \'attack key\' to open it and click on any item with the mouse. Maximum of 5 items!
TIP:Bob-Ombs have different scenes. It depends on when you catch them!
TIP:If you find a bug, try to reproduce it, press PAGE DOWN key and take a screenshot, then post in LOK or Aedler site. Luigi will fix it!
TIP:To exit a level, you either enter the door at the fort, get an item, or walk past the edges of the screen.
TIP:If you\'re dirty, you can clean yourself off in the bath or at checkpoints. If \'Clean Cum while Underwater\' in ON, just get underwater!
TIP:Sockhops are green bag-like enemies. Although they are not enemies exactly, they can harm you, but you can also make them happy!
TIP:You can use \'DEL\' key to make the princess lose a life if you\'re stuck!
TIP:Remember the princess will only wear a custom outfit if you set a given powerup to it, then search for it in the game!
TIP:You can have bigger bellies depending on the amount of cum in a vaginal/anal scene, or by taking certain potions.
TIP:Don\'t forget to check the key confgurations in PAUSE MENU (CTRL key!) You will check the keys to zoom in, for example.
